Cutie Bikini (Light Blue, Women)
kDesc
A cute, light blue, bikini-type swimsuit with slender ribbons attached. [#Legal]
Un joli bikini bleu clair avec des nœuds fins. [#Legal]
Ein süßer, hellblauer Bikini mit kleinen angenähten Schleifen. [#Legal]
Un grazioso bikini azzurro, con fiocchetti laterali. [#Legal]
Un bonito bikini azul claro con unos finos lazos. [#Legal]
細めのリボン結びがキュートな、水色のビキニタイプの水着。 [#Legal]
가는 리본 매듭이 큐트한, 하늘색의 비키니 타입 수영복. [#Legal]
A cute, light blue, bikini-type swimsuit with slender ribbons attached. [#Legal]
水藍色的比堅尼，附有可愛的幼帶蝴蝶結。[#Legal]
水藍色的比基尼，附有可愛的幼帶蝴蝶結。[#Legal]
A cute, light blue, bikini-type swimsuit with slender ribbons attached. [#Legal]
